words.enterId: Enter transaction ID, for example xtar-8724723-steem:

byId.step2:
Congratulations!

Transaction was sent to blockchain.

Control transaction in control panel, link:

Now give the link to the receiver and the escrow agent. They will have to approve the deal.

If there is no dispute

If the deal was successful, then no further action from the escrow agent is required.

The sender can send the funds to the receiver and the receiver can return the money to the sender.

If there is a a disputable situation

If someone violates the terms of the deal, either party (the recipient or sender) may challenge the transaction.

After that, the escrow agent will decide whom to send funds.

If the escrow period is over

After the deal has expired, the funds will no longer be protected by the escrow, and will be in the hands of the sender or receiver, depending on the choices made.
byId.labelLogin: Your login and password / Active WIF:
byId.labelAgent: Choose the escrow agent. To become an agent, post a comment here (sorted by agent reputation).
byId.selectOptionChooseAgent: Choose an agent from the list
byId.labelDeadline: Specify the period within which the recipient and the escrow must agree to commit the transaction. If they don't approve the transaction before the deadline, the funds will be automatically returned to the sender:
byId.labelEscrowEndDate: Specify the warranty expiration period after which either party can take any action (either take the money or send the other party). This period cannot be less than the previous one:
byId.labelTransactionTerms: Terms of the transaction (optional, but highly recommended)
byId.inputSendMeta: They will be needed in the event of a dispute
byId.actionSenderWaitingForApproval: Sender is waiting for approval from receiver and agent. If nobody approves the transaction before , the funds will be returned to the sender
byId.actionSenderApprovalReceived: Sender can either send the funds to the receiver or start a dispute:
byId.actionSenderWaitingEscrow: Sender waiting for escrow agent decision.
byId.actionReceiverWaitingForApproval: Receiver must approve or disapprove the transaction:
byId.actionReceiverApprovalReceived: Receiver can send funds back to the sender or start a dispute:
byId.actionReceiverWaitingEscrow: Receiver waiting for escrow agent decision.
byId.agentWaitingForApproval: Escrow agent must approve or disapprove the transaction:
byId.agentApprovalRecieved: No dispute yet. Escrow agent has nothing to do.
byId.agentEscrowExpired: Escrow warranty period expired. Now, anybody can take the funds or send them to the other party.
byId.actionCancelForm: Cancel transaction and return funds to the sender
byId.actionExpiredForm: Escrow warranty period expired, I keep the funds for me
byId.actionLoginPassword: Enter your login and password / Active WIF
byId.errorTransactionNotFound: Error! No active order with this ID in the blockchain. Searching last transactions with this ID...
